content:
You've already got a solid foundation in wire wrapping. Here are some advanced wire wrapping techniques and tutorials to help you create stunning pendants and charms:

**Pendant Tutorials:**

1. **Wrapped Crystal Pendant:** Learn to create a beautiful crystal pendant with a wrapped wire design.
	* Tutorial: [The Beading Gem's Wrapped Crystal Pendant Tutorial](https://www.thebeadinggem.com/2011/02/wrapped-crystal-pendant-tutorial.html)
2. **Caged Pendant:** Create a unique pendant with a caged design using wire wrapping techniques.
	* Tutorial: [Wire-Sculpture's Caged Pendant Tutorial](https://www.wire-sculpture.com/tutorials/caged-pendant-tutorial/)
3. **Filigree Pendant:** Master the art of filigree wire wrapping to create an intricate pendant.
	* Tutorial: [Lisa Niven Kelly's Filigree Pendant Tutorial](https://www.lisanivenkelly.com/tutorials/filigree-pendant-tutorial/)

**Charm Tutorials:**

1. **Wrapped Bead Charm:** Learn to create a simple yet elegant charm using wire wrapping and beads.
	* Tutorial: [Beadaholique's Wrapped Bead Charm Tutorial](https://www.beadaholique.com/tutorials/wrapped-bead-charm-tutorial/)
2. **Leaf Charm:** Create a delicate leaf charm using wire wrapping techniques.
	* Tutorial: [The Wire Wizard's Leaf Charm Tutorial](https://www.thewirewizard.com/tutorials/leaf-charm-tutorial/)
3. **Bird's Nest Charm:** Make a whimsical bird's nest charm using wire wrapping and beads.
	* Tutorial: [Craftsy's Bird's Nest Charm Tutorial](https://www.craftsy.com/jewelry-making/article/birds-nest-charm-tutorial/)

**Advanced Techniques:**

1. **Weaving with Wire:** Learn to weave wire to create intricate designs and patterns.
	* Tutorial: [Wire-Sculpture's Weaving with Wire Tutorial](https://www.wire-sculpture.com/tutorials/weaving-with-wire-tutorial/)
2. **Prong Setting:** Master the prong setting technique to create a secure setting for your pendants and charms.
	* Tutorial: [The Beading Gem's Prong Setting Tutorial](https://www.thebeadinggem.com/2012/02/prong-setting-tutorial.html)
3. **Wire Texturing:** Add texture and dimension to your wire work using various techniques.
	* Tutorial: [Lisa Niven Kelly's Wire Texturing Tutorial](https://www.lisanivenkelly.com/tutorials/wire-texturing-tutorial/)

These tutorials should help you improve your wire wrapping skills and create stunning pendants and charms. Remember to practice regularly and experiment with different techniques to develop your unique style.
